case: Your account can be deleted without prior notice and without a reason
quoteText: riseup.net may terminate your service at any time for any reason.

case: Your personal data is not shared with third parties
quoteText: We would like to clearly state that Riseup has never given any user information to any third party.

case: Your personal data is not sold
quoteText: none of the information we do collect is ever shared.</p

case: The service will resist legal requests for your information where reasonably possible
quoteText: We would rather pull the plug than submit to repressive surveillance by our government, or any government.

case: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked
quoteText: we do not keep IP identifying logs

case: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
quoteText: We are not liable for any damages related to the use of this service.

case: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content
quoteText:
You may not engage in the following activities through the services provided by riseup.net:

  • Harassing or abusing others by engaging in threats, stalking or sending spam.

case: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk
quoteText: You understand and agree that riseup provides online services “as is” and without any warranty, express, implied, or statutory.

case: An onion site accessible over Tor is provided
This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet your expectations or requirements
quoteText: We specifically disclaim any implied warrannties of title, merchantability, fitness for a particularly purpose and non-infringement.

case: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
quoteText: We make no warranty as to the reliability, accessibility, or quality of our services.

case: You should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify
quoteText: We reserve the right to change this policy. If we make major changes, we will notify our users in a clear and prominent manner.

case: No third-party analytics or tracking platforms are used
quoteText: We do not use any third party cookies or tracking of any kind.

Your web browser communicates uniquely identifying information to all web servers it visits by allowing the site to know details about your operating system, browser information, plugins installed, fonts installed, screen resolution, and much more. We do not retain any of this information.

case: User-generated content is encrypted, and this service cannot decrypt it
quoteText: All of your data is stored in an encrypted format, and only Riseup has the keys to decrypt the data. Additionally, as of March 2017, the storage for all new accounts is personally encrypted. Riseup is unable to read any of the stored content for these accounts.

case: Your personal data is used for limited purposes
quoteText: We retain only the bare minimum of information about each user that is required to make the service work.

case: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
quoteText:
Anonymous, aggregated information that cannot be linked back to an individual user may be made available to experienced researchers for the sole purpose of developing better systems for anonymous and secure communication.
For example, we may aggregate information on how many messages a typical user sends and receives, and with what frequency.

case: You have the right to leave this service at any time
quoteText: You may choose to delete your riseup.net account at any time.
